name: colambful
description:
Change your own colour to hide in the background's flat colours, and change others' colours to make them lose.

Also, you're all sheep.

Multiplayer (LAN and network support).

Made with unity and blender.
autumn-winter 2017

If you send me feedback I'd be very grateful.

Check out the Instructions file if you don't understand what to do or run into a bug, but the tutorial should be clear enough.

You can choose the colours the game uses, so it should be readable for daltonian people too.

Linux users: check the Bugs section of the instructions file before playing.
